translations: 拼写（spell 的第三人称单数）
符咒；魅力（spell 的复数）；一段时间

phrs.translation: adv. 被迷住；被符咒镇住
符咒书（小说中特有名词）；图书说明

sentences.sentence: She went to the doctor complaining of dizzy spells.
sentences.translation: 她去找医生看病，说自己一阵一阵地头昏。

sentences.sentence: There will be rain at first, with sunny spells later.
Too many golfers try to bash the ball out of sand. That spells disaster.
sentences.translation: 太多打高尔夫球的人试图把球胡乱打出沙坑。那就意味着灾难。
